website_summaries.verdict: The versatility of these switches and inclusivity of items in this kit makes it a must-have for anyone looking to purchase the best option.
pros: Controls up to 17, 8.5 watt LED bulbs and works without white neutral wire, meaning it’s compatible even with older homes
Easy-to-use app grants users ability to pre-schedule lighting for certain times of day
cons: Dimmer does not showcase ability to set default dimming mode

website_summaries.verdict: These are the best-performing, most fully-featured smart switches currently available, and well worth the money if you're serious about connected lighting.
pros: Lutron's in-wall smart switches are reliable performers that work with Alexa, Nest, IFTTT, Apple HomeKit and more

The well-designed Lutron app is easy to use, and offers plenty of helpful features, including geofencing, scene management, and a security mode that'll help make it look like you're home when you're not
cons: Lutron won't let you program your lights to fade on or off over a custom length of time, and the Lutron Bridge requires a hardwired Ethernet connection to your router

customer_reviews.title: Ended up replacing every switch in the house (20) with a combination of their Caseta wireless smart light/fan and dimmer switches
customer_reviews.text: Have had this system in place for over 6 months now. Ended up replacing every switch in the house (20) with a combination of their Caseta wireless smart light/fan and dimmer switches. I integrated this system with my ADT SmartThings system (activate lights when certain sensors are tripped) as well as Google Home (for voice control) and Logitech Harmony (for remote control). You can even use Google Home or SmartThings to create different scenes for different times and scenarios around and outside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. It Works with my recessed lighting
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these guys. I installed them today and they both work with the Lutron iPhone App. This product needs an upgrade. First of all, it needs to have a built in Wi-Fi feature. Second, a tough slider would be much better than the old fashion style of pressing a button up and down. No slider either. Third, the faceplate needs some LED lighting around it to make it more updated and modern looking. These dimmers look like from 1925 on a good day.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The Lutron Caseta Wireless Smart Lighting Dimmer Switch (2 count) Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: The Lutron Caseta Wireless Smart Lighting Dimmer Switch (2 count) Starter Kit, P-BDG-PKG2W-A, is awesome. It comes with two dimmer switches, a hub and two Pico remote controls. The kit is designed to use each dimmer in a different location, if you are going to place both switches together, order the Lutron Claro 2 Gang Decorator Wall plate. I used both switches in the kitchen to light up a 16” and 32” LED light made for a dimmer switch. Remember your light must be able to dim for the switch to work correctly. Everything works great, Alexa controls my kitchen lights and the two Pico remotes control the kitchen lights anywhere in the house. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: RonBaby

customer_reviews.title: I picked up the system at a great price with a Black Friday "Alexa" deal
customer_reviews.text: Whole system installed quickly, integrates with Siri and works with voice commands as I had hoped. I also installed several additional Caseta Wireless switches for additional lights, pico remotes and Caseta Wireless on/off for fans and they also worked with zero issues. I picked up the system at a great price with a Black Friday "Alexa" deal. If ordering switches for fans, make sure you only get 2-pole if that's all you need as they make two models. During the install I had a few questions about wiring and called into Lutron tech support and they answered the calls quickly, had US based support staff and told me exactly what to do. A+ across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great system but pay attention to range constraint
customer_reviews.text: Great system. Works with Alexa or HomeKit. Super easy to install. Amazon price for Caseta switches isn’t super competitive at the time of writing but the product is great. Look for a sale. The range from any switch to the hub is 30 ft. Beyond that, switch won’t be able to connect to app and therefore won’t be a smart switch. Lamp controller will extend range an extra 30 ft from where it’s placed but only 1 can be used as a range extender.
customer_reviews.author: NWOutdoors

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Lutron Caseta smart dimmer for my recessed living room light setup after the WeMo dimmer switches I purchased failed to work or dimmer the lights. The Lutron switch was simple to install as there's no guess work to matching the correct line/load wires to the switch because somehow Lutron has allowed you to connect the wires in any order you want and they handle the rest. The Lutron bridge was up fast with minimal effort and the lights configured on the phone app. Soon later I installed the Alexa Lutron skill so I could control the lights by giving the Amazon echo voice commands. Great product, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco C.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good reasons to use this switch but get ready to purchase bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: If you only have 2 wires to the existing switch and no neutral or want an easy way to control from multiple locations with the Pico remotes this is a good choice. Be ready to purchase the bulbs that Lutron has certified on their website. I installed this switch next to a Caseta fan control switch and had to replace the fan light bulbs to get the light switch to work. I purchased the  and they work fine, just an additional step and expense. In future rooms I'll use a different light dimmer switch along with the Caseta fan control.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: The installation isn’t the best since the kit doesn’t include the plastic wall insert that lets you mount the remote into an outlet box for a three way switch. Also, the two black wire setup won’t work for all light fixtures, my dining room chandelier didn’t receive enough power and needs a neutral attachment to work properly. Lutron was nice enough to send me one for free, but still, this won’t work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: CRPTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Everything Lutron makes is just so polished. It costs a little more but with that you get a superior product with outstanding us-based support. I cannot sing praises of this company enough. Enough with fiddling around with the old imported junk and now I deal with Lutron products developed by people who know what they are doing and build it with pride. Simply amazing, amazing, amazing. Anything I could think of to improve these switches has already been thought of.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Switch on the Market
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these kits to integrate into our Google powered Smart Home. The dimmer switches and hub work flawlessly with both Google Home & Apple HomeKit that we’ve tested. The Lutron hub is very responsive to commands whether it’s voice activation or app controlled. The switches are dead simple to install and app is very easy to customize the devices connected. Like all other Quality Smart Devices it usually requires a investment into your home, however these are definitely worth the upgraded cost and you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Flawless connection to the Lutron hub and internet app
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it works great, been adding these Lutrons to my lighting system for a year now. The only issue I've had is, and only if you're listening for it, is that you can hear a hum in my fusebox (and a slight hum at the bulb itself) that these circuits are on, even with LED bulbs that "say" that they're able to be used by this switch. Hard to tell if it's the bulb or the dimmers. Otherwise, excellent system, it's easy to connect to the hub, and the app works flawlessly. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopherflowers

customer_reviews.title: It works great with Alexa and so far I have had no ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this to further automate my house. It works great with Alexa and so far I have had no issues. Installation was easy and the App works great (Currently using IPhone & Ipad). I have subsequently added four more dimmers and a plug in. Since the dimmers and switches work using the Lutron Caseta Hub any additional dimmers or plug-ins are easily added using the App. The hub is also helpful if you have a limited amount of Ethernet connections on your Router I believe the hub enable you to connect 50 dimmers/plug-ins, e.t.c. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhungry

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: This system has worked great so far! Easy to integrate with Alexa and works with no neutral wire and on 3 way switches. I have a old house that the upstairs wiring is the old original 1925 wiring for the original ceiling pendants. Since this needed no neutral wire it worked perfectly. So fair it has been fairly reliable with Alexa. I have had to reboot the hub about twice in the last month. But not terrible. Very happy with the system.
customer_reviews.author: abigail

customer_reviews.title: Switched switch
customer_reviews.text: The contents of the box had been switched (pun intended). When this arrives, it comes in a plain brown box with the kit inside. Well, one of my switches, was switched, with a plain switch. The box was perfect, unopened, seal still on it, but the switch inside was not the correct one. Amazon worked with me to get a refund, but it was still a pain. Make sure you get the correct thing when you order this. The correct switch works great and the product is awesome. Kinda expensive for what it is, but still cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and addition to smart home products.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add to our smart home a product that I could control myself. We do have Savant for some items but anytime they need servicing I have to call our tech person. I am very pleased with this product! I watched some youtube videos about installation before I bought these and was pretty confident I could install them myself. It was a breeze! Just be sure to turn off the electricity of the switch you're working on at the main electrical panel. My husband was super impressed at my DIY work :). I use ours with Apple Home kit.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Simply install, setup and use. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed! I was hoping to avoid the need for a hub/bridge, but my older home isn’t outfitted with neutral wires. Thus, it was either spend thousands to upgrade electrical or buy the bridge. Needless to say, we bought the bridge. I couldn’t be happier with the purchase. So easy to install, and we are up and running in less than 10 minutes. Thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love to be able to adjust the lighting with a remote. I had new led lights put in and the electrician installed it. I had a different Lutron one that was installed 13 years ago and love it but it did not work wiIt’s led lights. You can’t beat Lutron products and support if you ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Great no neutral installation! App need a lot of work
customer_reviews.text: The installation without the neutral is amazing. Tech support was available though they were not able to give me clear direction and a multi gang setup that had extra wires. The app is terrible. Cannot figure out how to give different users their own logins, setting up the schedule is totally confusing. Every action is separate, you should program the on and off in the same screen. If they fix the app and have more installation videos this could be the killer product for getting into the home.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M-E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand-alone or smart home network compatability
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product works seemlessly with my smart home network. For these switches, you must use a light bulb which burns at least 10.5 watts otherwise be prepared for flickering and a noticeable buzz when when the lights are on. The Lutron Caseta app has no delay in turning the switches on or off and Lutron's customer service is very friendly and knowledgable of wiring configuration work-arounds.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: great integration with Google Assistant, no buzz/hum
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the living room dimming switch since I'm upgrading to smart devices around the house. It was a breeze to install for a first timer - took me about 15-20 mins to complete. I'm glad that this switch doesn't make my LED bulbs hum/buzz like my previous switches, but its dependent on the type of bulbs you use so YMMV. Google Assistant worked amazingly with the Lutron Bridge (included with the kit version). Will be getting more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: omanko

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love that these communicate on a different frequency than wifi and connect directly to my network via wired hub. They respond quickly when giving Alexa commands and work very well. Getting alerts that I left my lights on is also a great feature. Hopefully someday, they'll have even more types of devices that work with this hub.
customer_reviews.author: Trunq22

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Beautiful switch upgrades, and wow... How much fun is it to turn the Lights on and off with Alexa? Slowly adding more and more of these switches and Pico remotes until the whole house is automated... This particular kit is great, in that it basically gives you the Smart Hub for free... Great price and savings when buying these items as a starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: I installed Lutron Caseta Wireless Smart Lighting Dimmer switch and pico remotes in my newly ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed Lutron Caseta Wireless Smart Lighting Dimmer switch and pico remotes in my newly built custom house. I have limited upper body strength and I was looking for something exactly like this. I installed five dimmer switches to control recessed lights in five different locations. It took me a while to set it up to work with Echo dot and it is working flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good home wireless kit with Apple Home integration
customer_reviews.text: Good home wireless kit with Apple Home integration. Great for smaller houses / condos / apartments with not as many different lighting stages / settings (would recommend the full RadioRA kit for the bigger homes). Easy to setup. Might not as nice as the LeGrand Adorne in terms of aesthetics, but these are much better for Apple users.
customer_reviews.author: KHKL

customer_reviews.title: Great option and easy to install.  No need to buy expensive "smart" bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! LOVE LOVE this product. Wiring was easy (after reading up on how a 3 and 4 way switches). I'm not an electrician by any stretch but using the online advanced instructions provided by Lutron I was able to get everything setup in less than 30 minutes. I can now control the lights using Alexa, my phone / tablet and the wall dimmers/remotes. My only issue was that my CFL bulbs were not dimmable. After replacing those with new LED bulbs everything worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up, not fan/light rated
customer_reviews.text: The devices themselves work great; however they are not rated for light/fan combos. I had to send them back because I was getting a buzzing noise. I called their customer support when I set it up and they confirmed its because they were not designed for my set up. Their customer support was charming.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Morales

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but great for home automation for old homes
customer_reviews.text: I had old style wiring(only two wires) so I had to get these in order to start using my google home with the lights. Installation was easy with the video they provided. You will need to buy a border if you have a 3 way switch.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo R.

customer_reviews.title: Great option for dimming/timer combo. Add extra switches without extra wiring.
customer_reviews.text: I was searching high and low for a combination timer/dimmer for my outdoor lights. Apparently that doesn't exist other than in 'smart' switches. The biggest selling point for this system is the little pico remotes that meant I could put an extra switch at each entry door without having to add a bunch of wiring. Once you get over the sticker shock, the ease of use is pretty instant.
customer_reviews.author: D*Funk

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous Product From An Exceptional Company
customer_reviews.text: Installed for individual and scene control of five can kitchen overhead, single sink can, interior cupboard and under counter, chandelier lights. Simple easy installation and linking to bridge, Pico remotes, Alexa. For such a recent technology Lutron has nailed it. Their 24/7 tech support is answered by folks with expertise right here in America and their software for smartphone is extremely competently put together. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Lukenbill

customer_reviews.title: Overall solid w/ one minor drawback
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution - one of two products on the markets - for older homes without a neutral wire. The Pico remote is good on function, but terrible on shape. You can’t tell if the on/off button is on top/bottom in the dark. Install was easy and Google Home sync was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi

customer_reviews.title: They are fantastic! This allowed me to add switches in areas ...
customer_reviews.text: I intended to put a simple dimmer switch on my living room light. After finding and trying out the Lutron dimmers I have replaced 5 main switches and added 7 remotes in my house. They are fantastic! This allowed me to add switches in areas where there was no wiring and I used to walk through the dark to get to a wall switch. I can imagine what it would have cost to have an electrician come in and run all of the wiring. I’ve called customer service twice and they have been very helpful and pleasant to work with. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful system.
customer_reviews.text: I've been unsure what types of smart control I wanted to use with HomeKit and very happy I chose Caseta. If the wall switches had a preset like the remotes it would be perfect. If Lutron lowers the prices especially on the lamp dimmer switches I will install them everywhere. I love the interface and ease of use and I love saying "all lights out" into my Apple Watch when I leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and work great with Echo Dot.
customer_reviews.text: only took my electrician 10 minutes per switch to replace my old x10 switches. My sight is very limited so this makes a great way to not stumble around in the dark looking for a switch. Works great with my Echo Dots. I bought 7 more switches and gave each of my kids this set. Well made. Finding the on and off buttons is hard for me with my eyes and hands. I think I will add a little sticker raised dot to help me feel where to push. I will find many more uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: These switches are easy to install and work well with Alexa after you figure out how to set the switches up, could defiantly use better documentation for setup. Lights take a few seconds after turning on to come on, so sometimes you think they didn’t switch didn’t work? Also agree with others that bracket to wall mount remote should be included in switch package for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bulletproof smart switches
customer_reviews.text: Excellent system and bulletproof operation. On one switch experienced a current leak due to how the common was wired in the house, which resulted in a light not completely turning off with the Lutron on/off switch. I contacted Lutron support and told them the problem which is fixed by the installation of a capacitor between the load and common wires. Instead of sending just one for free (~$11 each on amazon) they sent 3 for no charge! Hence, great tech support in addition to a great product. Importantly, it is also Homekit compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Toxlab

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: used caseta switches a few times before, remotes too, always easy to install and work fine. but this was a really good deal with all that was included. never used the bridge before, so looking forward to what that offers.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Caseta and SONOS One changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We love using this with Alexa and Sonos (SONOS changed my life - buy one). The only grip that I have is that its kind of hard to determine which button is which in the dark... but thats a fraction of the percent of interactions that I have with this. I can just ask Alexa to turn on the lights instead. or use my phone... its hardly a complaint - these light switches are all that I imagined they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home automation
customer_reviews.text: I got this for home automation and it is perfect for that. I'm very satisfied with the product, one drawback (or annoying setup step) is limited with the selection of compatible bulbs, but for what it costs and how easy it is to setup/use, its well worth it. It does lack a 'favorite' or 'recall last setting' option which would be nice, but I've read that there are other models that have that feature I believe. But overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: iJKJames

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and useful product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with all of the Lutron Caseta products I have purchased. I bought a bridge, multiple switches and multiple Pico remotes. I installed them all myself. I had only one issue with the wiring and Lutron customer support was able to walk me through it over the phone. Otherwise these are easy to install and set up. I love that I can now control my lighting via Alexa and with my phone. For not a lot of money (relatively speaking) you are able to make the house feel like it has a high end integrated system. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: Wow how impressed I was with this very easy to install very easy to set up and works perfectly in a house that was built in 1954 this was a house that had no grounds in the plugs so I do this without a ground and it works perfectly I definitely would recommend this product for older homes
customer_reviews.author: CALVIN FRANK WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: I've installed these switches in 2 homes. They are pretty easy to install, as you do not need a neutral wire and with the exception of the ground wire, it doesnt matter which wires you connect.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Control lights from anywhere
customer_reviews.text: These switches work perfect. I can control my lights from anywhere on my phone, set timers so they turn off or on at certain times and control them through Google Home if I’m too lazy to get up from the couch to turn the lights on or off. These can be set up to work as a 3-way switch when paired with the Pico remote, however you do need to buy the adapter to put the remote in as a wall switch. The wiring is a little trickier, but if you just google it, there is a great you tube video that shows you have to do it.
customer_reviews.author: J-Ro

customer_reviews.title: No neautral wire required
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find the Caseta series. I really needed Alexa to operate my overhead lights. My new house did not have a neutral wire. I kept hunting for an alternative. Eventually found this. Perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Nth

customer_reviews.title: Love the Caseta Series - Alexa and Siri do too!
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple Caseta switches and dimmer modules throughout my home. Love the fact they are Alexa and Apple Home Kit controllable. Plus having the app on your phone and the ability to schedule things to turn on and off at set times is super helpful. Walking into a room and saying "Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights" is somehow empowering and completes my life. Or they just work really well. You decide. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hurlbut

customer_reviews.title: Never worry about leaving a light on again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I can turn my lights on and off anywhere with the Lutron App. Great for coming home after dark when you forgot to leave a light on. You can turn it on before you get there and you don't have to walk into a dark house I you can change out an outlet you can install this product. Very easy to set up and get working.
customer_reviews.author: NoJoe

customer_reviews.title: Love them but they disconnect often
customer_reviews.text: I wired up my entire first floor, then automated the lights for a series of scenarios. Love them, and made my house a lot more comfortable (no more going downstairs because I forgot to turn off the lights, or forgetting to turn on or off the porch lights).
customer_reviews.author: Luca Candela

customer_reviews.title: Best smart lighting
customer_reviews.text: I am a home integration specialist with over 20 years experience. By far the best system out there. Easy to install, Easy to program. And works flawlessly (every time without fail). No need to run a neutral leg, or a control wire. Works well with Alexa, I love my light being on an astronomical timer.
customer_reviews.author: George McCollough

customer_reviews.title: Extremely reliable
customer_reviews.text: Lutron's Caseta system is extremely reliable. I also use Phillips Hue and Wemo lighting devices, both of which will fail to respond from time to time. My Lutron devices have never failed.
customer_reviews.author: Donavon B.

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I do this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Been looking at these for more than a year now and finally got it. Replaced an outside switch and a 4-way. Could t have been easier and now they are programmed to go when I want them to.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Lutron Caseta Starter Kit - great value - Just know you’ll buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit to get started. Dimmers and Pico dimmer remotes work great, super easy to install. Works great for LED lights. And the included Bridge in the kit brings HomeKit integration that’s also ridiculously easy to get going.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wellborn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and reliable, no problems installing, love the features especially scheduling lights to go on and off (front porch and coach lights in my case). Materials seem to be good quality, wish the price could be lowered a little though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one that works
customer_reviews.text: Great product works with alexa flawlessly. Tried C by GE which was epic fail. Thia is what you want i. A older home without a neutral wire.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: If you need to add switches somewhere and don't want to open up walls, or program your lights, this is the way to go. Easy to use and install, looks nice and clean. Only complaint is that the bridge doesn't come in other colors so it sticks out against the rest of my black electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m just amazed that it works! Me-without any help got this thing to go. Really excited-feel a little bit like I’m In a Jetsons episode which maybe shows my age a little bit too much but... It is what it is. Next, maybe it’ll bring me food...
customer_reviews.author: A Kamberelis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Smart Lighting Dimmer Switch!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2-pack bundle with the bridge and pico remotes and could not be happier. I installed one of the smart dimmer switches on a set of 7 recessed LED lights in my outdoor soffit and the other controls my 2 outdoor sconces. Both sets work flawlessly. Installation was painless and the Lutron Caseta app works well. I will definitely be purchasing more of these smart dimmer switches for additional lighting around my house. Also is very cool that it can be used with IOS and the Smart Home app on the iphone. A+++++++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Price was The same as in store but I could order all-in-one place in bulk. These can be tricky to set up if you have a two-pole but one set up they work awesome
customer_reviews.author: saintzk

customer_reviews.title: Works like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: The dimmers are easy to install, and the set-up was relatively easy as well. Finally, no more re-timing of light when DST arrives. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: G Jo

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me with two wire switch and dimmers
customer_reviews.text: I have a older home with two wire switches plus ground and this solution worked great. Eventually I'll do every switch in the house. I can control at the switch, pica remote, smart phone, and Alexa. How do beat that?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Favorite product to date. Easy install. No connection issues very stable on the network. Alexa and HomeKit connectivity works amazing. Expensive but worth. Will be adding more in time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great dimmer switches
customer_reviews.text: Best dimmers ever. I have not used too many other dimmers but these are great. I spent a lot of time reading up the instructions to install these, also saw some Youtube videos and then the installation was fine. The instructions are very detailed and if you follow them you will not go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Manish Parekhji

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Easy installation and set up. Took me less than 15 minutes to install and set up. No neutral wire needed.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a smart home
customer_reviews.text: Works great replaced a few switches that controlled several lights and a 3 way light. Mounted the pico remote where the other switch goes works even if the internet is out. Wish it came with the bracket to mount the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to control LED lights for a Christmas present for the granddaughter- my son will install it but it hasn't been completed yet-
customer_reviews.author: Sawdustmaker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about these switches. Easy install (no neutral needed), function seamlessly and integrate without fuss to Alexa. I really like the way they gradually come on and off. I've got 10 of these throughout my house and they make life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought lutron caseta from Amazon. It usually takes about 15-30 minutes to install. You will need dimmable bulbs to work with this. Thankfully there is no neutral wire, that makes the installation pretty simple. It integrates with Alexa and google home through their app. I considered Philip’s hue lights, but I felt that it’s way more expensive then Lutron switches.
customer_reviews.author: parag awadhiya

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I invested a bunch of money in Alexa Echo devices around my home assuming that this would work with Alexa. However, Alexa will not discover the device. I have contacted Amazon support who couldn’t help me, and Luton support who are slow to reply. It will integrate with Apple HomeKit, Logitech Harmony, and Google Assistant, but not Amazon Alexa. So disappointing since it is sold by and shipped by Amazon. I should have just gotten Google Assistant devices!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas N

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. The electrician was unable to connect this to our undercounter lights. He said it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Candee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and the app is intuitive
customer_reviews.text: Clean looking design that is a simple swap-out of the old light switch. The wireless bridge was easy to connect and Lutron app is easy to use. I bought he starter kit + one addition dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: ERICH

customer_reviews.title: I have an old home with a lot of switches ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an old home with a lot of switches that had power but didn’t seem to power anything. Puttting these in allowed me to have both classic wall switches and control with my phone and Alexa
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: No Neutral wire, no problem. Works with Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: Own an old house, this is the solution if you don't have neutral wires. Works perfect with Alexa. Turning off can be a little slow. Wish it there was a way to skip dimmer and just turn on and off. More expensive then competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M.

customer_reviews.title: A monkey can install these and they work well
customer_reviews.text: Install was a breeze. U can make every switch in ur house a three way if u go w the Pico remote. If this thing breaks with in ten years, like the terminator I'll be back. But a month in and I'm a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ace

customer_reviews.title: these are so easy yo install and set up and very cool
customer_reviews.text: these are so easy yo install and set up and very cool. "Siri turn n the porch light" and she does! changing all my switches to these
customer_reviews.author: darren maines

customer_reviews.title: Great smart lighting solution, pico remote is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Tried several z-wave lighting solutions, but it was buggy across the board. Smart home early adopter tax I guess. Finally tried Lutron and have now swapped everything out to these, great system, good integration and I love the RF remotes. Voice commands are cool, but the remotes are just as useful. Easy to install and works flawlessly. Wish I started here, but glad I finally found these.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn

customer_reviews.title: Numerous add on devices available
customer_reviews.text: Good product just follow instructions from online and you ll breeze to install completion for 3 way switches.

customer_reviews.title: Making me lazy and I love it! haha Easy to install and the app ...
customer_reviews.text: Making me lazy and I love it! haha Easy to install and the app makes it easy to use and control your lighting settings. Different dimmable options, on/off, and can be voice activated with an alexa device connected.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for voice control!
customer_reviews.text: Only thing i would change is that when Alexa turns on the lights, they turn on instantly to bright. When you push the button on the switch it does a gradual fade up which i think I prefer.

customer_reviews.title: It’s near perfect
customer_reviews.text: you’ll need to change some high hats as most are not comparable. Some just work but others you have to swap. Otherwise. Yea this product is great.

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: A real nice product. Easy to set up. The interface is not cool and nerdy. Other than lacking the cool factor, its great,

customer_reviews.title: Works very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Grate product support Alexa, Siri, Google very reliable, very easy to install. Just be aware that the bus required a minimal loas about 6 to 8 Watts on led to work well with dimmer

customer_reviews.title: Lutron makes a great product. This allowed us to control a switch ...
customer_reviews.text: Lutron makes a great product. This allowed us to control a switch that was located in an inconvenient spot. Dimming and mobile control is great as well.

customer_reviews.title: Not working on all LED lights
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended I guess since only tested LED lights works with this model. I had a super low light on the LED light it self even though the switch was in the off position. I added a Lutron LUT-MLC device and it resolved my issue. Works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Ulf B

customer_reviews.title: Great price, use lutron for support
customer_reviews.text: Had a lightswitch bad out of the box. Frustrating that amazon wouldn't replace just the switch. Ended up going through lutron so i wouldn't have to send the whole kit back to amazon.

customer_reviews.title: How did I not have this already!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Can be controlled thru an app on your phone or thru Amazon Alexa with your voice. Easy to install! Perfect for the theater room where you want to set moods and control the lighting from one of many ways.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but work great!

customer_reviews.title: Great with HomeKit and 3-pole installations
customer_reviews.text: Works great with HomeKit! I've installed 8+ and favor these switches over WeMo's. Lutron Caseta switches are reliable, 3-pole installation compatible (e.g. 2 switches to control 1 light), configurable, etc.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest, most attractive and perfectly working light system.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Love how my lights turn on when I come home. I can control them from my Apple Watch and Google Home. Dimmer worked on hallway recessed lights and dinning room lights.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works well with iPhone app, very easy to create scenes and schedules. I'll definitely be finishing off the house with them.

customer_reviews.text: Installed these in my house, connected the hub, and paired it with my phone. It was all really easy and now allows me to control lights via HomeKit. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.text: Switches were easy to install (I'm an electrician) and the pico remotes paired up fairly easy. The bridge is what brings these dimmers to life! I use Siri to turn on my lights through Home Kit along with my Google Home. Awesome product.

customer_reviews.text: My porch and outdoor garage come on automatically at dusk and go off at dawn. I can control them with an internet app from anywhere in the world. I love it and have waited for years for such a system. This is as easy to install as any light switch. My wife loves it too.

product_meta.title: Lutron Caseta Smart Start Kit, Dimmer Switch (2 Count) with Smart Bridge and Pico remotes, Works with Alexa, Apple HomeKit, and the Google Assistant | P-BDG-PKG2W-A | White
product_meta.description: Style:Dimmer Deluxe KitThe Caseta wireless Deluxe dimmer kit with smart bridge provides simple and personalized control of your lights, shades and temperature. Control your lights from anywhere within your home with the included Pico remote controls or from anywhere in the world using the free Lutron app. Set lights to automatically adjust with spring and fall time changes, create personalized schedules to turn on, off, or dim lights at set times to best fit your everyday routines, or control lights with your voice via Alexa and Siri. The smart bridge also connects with other leading brands like Honeywell, Eco bee, Sonos, Serena shades and more. The included in-wall dimmers install easily with no neutral wire required, provide the best dimming performance for over 500 different dimmable LED bulbs, and can be controlled from anywhere within the home with the included Pico remotes. To use dimmers in a multi-location application, replace the existing switch with a Pico remote control and wall plate Adapter (PICO-WBX-ADAPT, sold separately). Pico remote control takes (1) CR2032 battery, included in remote.
feature_bullets: PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with changing seasons so your family always comes back to a well lit home; you can also enable the Smart Away feature to randomly turn your lights on and off to look like you’re home even if you’re away
MOST CONNECTED: Caseta connects with more leading smart home devices – including Alexa, Apple Home Kit, the Google Assistant, Serena shades and Sonos – than any other smart lighting control brand

CONTROL YOUR WAY: Caseta puts the smarts in the switch so you can control your lights a variety of ways – via the free Lutron app, your voice, or from the wall. You can create personalized schedules to turn on, off, or dim lights at set times to best fit your everyday routines, or activate favorited lighting scenes with the touch of a button
RELIABLY SMART: The smart bridge doesn’t use Wi Fi, so you get super fast, ultra reliable smart lighting that works right, without slowing your Wi Fi down with more devices
SET IT AND FORGET IT: Always keep your smart light functionality. Even when the Wi Fi goes down, there’s no need to reset your schedules and scenes or reconnect everything when it comes back online

GET MORE, SPEND LESS: One Caseta smart switch can control many bulbs at once; make many bulbs smart, even your existing bulbs. Get smart control of multiple styles of dimmable LED, incandescent, and halogen bulbs
WORKS WITH EXISTING WIRING: Unlike other smart dimmer switches, Caseta works in any home, of any age, as it does not require a neutral wire

EASY 3 WAY SETUP: With the included Pico remote control, create a 3 way by mounting the Pico to almost any wall surface without cutting holes or pulling wire. You can also replace existing 3 way switches by mounting the Pico over the back box; wall plate bracket, PICO WBX ADAPT, required for mounting Pico and sold separately
TECHNICAL DETAILS: Works with up to 150W dimmable LED light bulbs/CFL light bulbs or 600W incandescent bulbs/halogen bulbs; not rated for low voltage applications (I. e. track or landscape lighting)
Includes (1) Caseta smart bridge, (2) Caseta dimmer switches with wall plates, and (2) Pico 3 button dimming remotes
